title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1642-6.7 - Insurance claims
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1642-6.7 - Insurance claims

State Regulations

Accounting entries and procedures in connection with
claims arising from losses covered by insurance are described in the definition
of account 1670, Insurance Claims Clearance (see Part 1641). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1642-6.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
